definition: An existing parcel subject to amendment due to new boundary adoption from an abutting parcel
A new parcel being created in a plan (e.g. (PS) plan of subdivision; (OP) original plan
An existing parcel encroached by a new boundary adoption from an abutting parcel
A parcel that exists on the cadastre and the boundaries are not affected
An existing parcel subject to cancellation
An easement / restriction subject to removal
